title: What are the best universities in England for History? - Quora
tags: Colleges and Universities in the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: The Sunday Times Good University Guide gives you the following as the top 12:  I notice you also asked about the worst universities for History, but so long as you avoid Bradford, Brighton, Greenwich, Sunderland, Worcester, Wolverhampton, Bath Spa, Salford and (rather surprisingly) Kingston, you should be fine. And you probably didn’t want to go to most of those anyway.

I agree with the previous responders, but there is another dimension to your question… If you choose, the University of Oxford, or that of Cambridge, perhaps Durham or even London or Lincoln, then you will also be able to enjoy the delights of living within a superbly historical setting. In the case of Oxford and Cambridge, then it will be within two of the most historical universities in the world!
